title: Nick Is Officially A Stand Up Comic - The GameOverGreggy Show Ep. 188
description:
We talk about Nick doing stand up, Greg Miller comes up with a new business, discuss criticism and recast the Black Eyed Peas. (Released first to Patreon Supporters on 07.14.17)

Thanks to Pro Flowers for sponsoring this episode. Go to http://www.proflowers.com and use promo code greggy

Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.
